title: "My Snowdown Shop"
body: Just curious if I am missing something. "My Snowdown Shop" was scheduled to start 12/16, correct? I do not see it when I try and find it within the client. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: We're trying to work out issues that were preventing some players from receiving all of their offers. Unfortunately, I don't have an ETA at the moment.

Oh nice, a red on one of my few threads I've ever posted. :P

But thanks for the quick response, hope it gets worked out! Merry Christmas (and Happy Holidays) to all of you at Riot. Oh, and tell fizzNchips I want a rematch in mid-lane at some point!
LIKE DONKEY KONG, IT IS ON.

> [{quoted}](name=fizzNchips,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FVeBa1U7,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-12-16T21:56:28.662+0000)
>
> LIKE DONKEY KONG, IT IS ON.

If you mean that the shop is online, it isn't for me. I even relogged like 5 minutes ago.

He was talking about the rematch lol

> Oh, and tell fizzNchips I want a rematch in mid-lane at some point!

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FVeBa1U7,comment-id=00000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-12-16T22:24:59.051+0000)
>
> He was talking about the rematch lol

Oh.... I'm stupid what do you want from me.
Eternum Rek'Sai. I can wait, she's on sale in January.

I'm gonna beat you like a dusty rug!

Whenever you are free, let me know though! :P

Of course! .__.b 

Merry Christmas to you as well! I'll let him know! :P

You and fizzNchips are officially my favorite Rioters. 

Glad to read that it is slowly being rolled out now too.
this is a shop breaking issue they are trying to resolve ( the issue i believe is it is not working for many many player). they have been working on it all day, it will be enabled when they are done
